creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Marilyn Tupper Doe
description: brightly dressed people walking between grouping of brightly colored torii gates framing a small vendor selling souvenirs; large stone gate at center flanked by two stone foxes
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Twelve Months of Kyoto 京名勝十二月
title: February (The annual festival of the Fushimi Inari)
